p.d: Ireland In Ireland, Benjamin Darnaud meets farmers who are passionate about what they do. Jeffa Gill makes a renowned Durrus cheese. Martin and Noreen breed an ancient English breed of pig, the Saddleback. Sally Barnes practices traditional fish smoking methods, while Bernard King raises lambs of incomparable flavour. Directed by: Frédéric Planchenault (France, 2017)
